name: Overflowing Motivation! LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If the number of your stock is 2 or less, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power.
flavorText: Sure! I'm up for anything! Tell me the plan!

name: "Pink Devil" LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Word of Honor" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Vow?

name: Promise to Be Kept, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If you have another level 3 or higher character, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Cleansing with Grenades! Fukaziroh", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: You remember our promise, don't you?

name: Brimming with Fighting Spirit, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If "Obstinate Death Wish, Pitohui" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If all of your charaters are 《Avatar》 or 《Net》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom card of your clock into your stock.
flavorText: So... let's do this!

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, Shiori
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I bet that tea was really expensive.

name: Interested in VR, Karen
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters revealed among those cards ×1000. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: N-Nothing happened! I just thought I'd try playing one.

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club Leader, Saki
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put it into your waiting room. For each ""Operation Sweets" A Major Success!" or "Course of the Last Battle" revealed among them, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: All right, ladies. Cut the chatter.

name: Question About Chances of Winning, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: Can I still win this?

name: Craving for Sweets Too! Saki & Milana
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if ""Operation Sweets" A Major Success!" is in your climax area, choose up to 2 《SHINC》 or 《Sports》 characters in your waiting room, and put them into your stock in any order.
flavorText: Please invite us over again!

name: Taking Every Last Ounce of Courage, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Serious Battle" is in your climax area, put up to 2 cards from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I-I have to beat that?

name: Boss of 《SHINC》, Eva
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Course Of The Last Battle" is in your climax area, you may put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I'll finish her off.

name: 《SHINC》, Sophie
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《SHINC》 or 《Sports》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Degtyaryov Anti-Tank Rifle" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Everyone! The rest is up to you!

name: Narrow Escape from Death, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or less cards in your stock, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: M: "Don't get down about it. You're a lucky girl, LLENN."

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, Milana
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I want marshmallows!

name: Thoroughness of Small, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock." 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: "Czech submachine gun, vz. 61. Two of them."

name: Hunch of a Reunion, Karen
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: It couldn't be, could it?

name: 《SHINC》, Roza
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: The grenade?

name: 《SHINC》, Toma
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Degtyaryov Anti-Tank Rifle" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Your life is mine!

name: Lurking in a Suitcase LLENN
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, if your level is 2 or higher, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your "Lively Assult, LLENN" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: "A suitcase. An empty can. Actually, three of them."

name: Poncho Style, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I see.

name: 《SHINC》, Tanya
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Enemy locat―

name: "Last Battle", LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 "Satellite Scan" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and return this card to your hand.
flavorText: Eva: "Wh-Why won't you die?"

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, Moe
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets -3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
After it's over,
I want to have more of her sweets!

name: All Set! LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +4500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "With My Beloved Weapons, Fukaziroh" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: No more doubts!

name: 《SHINC》, Anna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: She's tiny!

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, Risa
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】 by your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects."
flavorText: Her green tea was good, too!

name: "Operation Sweets", Eva
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: This is a little far, but proceed as planned.

name:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club, Kana
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: And Hokkaido sweets, too!

name: Slip into Pink, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If you have another "Best Tactic Up Their Sleeves, Fukaziroh", this card gets +3500 power and cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Say this to your teammates. "I killed Pink!" Say, "Everyone, stop firing."

name: Plasma Grenade
text: All of your opponent's characters get -500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: It's the only way!

name: Degtyaryov Anti-Tank Rifle
text: If you do not have a 《SHINC》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of his or her deck. Put this card into your memory. Deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of "Degtyaryov Anti-Tank Rifle" in your memory. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
Affiliated Girls' High School
Rhythmic Gymnastics Club special, the Anti-M ultimate weapon,
or M-GUN for short!

name: Word of Honor
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText:
Pitohui: "So, someday we'll seriously
go up against each other, and if I lose, we'll meet in real life. It's a promise between women!"

name: Course of the Last Battle
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: I win.

name: "Operation Sweets" A Major Success!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText:
Kana: "We can have a serious battle
against LLENN anytime."

name: Serious Battle
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Insightful Shooter, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of his or her deck in the original order. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put it into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among them, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I have just one objective!

name: Rampaging in "GGO"! Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Don't Underestimate A Fairy!" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Okay, let's go!

name: Insane LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there are 1 or more 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters revealed among those cards, choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -2000 power until end of turn. If there are 2 or more, choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -4000 power until end of turn. If there are 3 or more, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Even By Gnawing Through The Throat" is in your climax area, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: That's why I'm here right now!

name: Cleansing with Grenades! Fukaziroh
text: 【CONT】 Experience If "Promise to Be Kept, LLENN" and "Cleansing with Grenades! Fukaziroh" are in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Promise to Be Kept, LLENN" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: What can I say? That's how it's done.

name: Beautiful Beloved Weapon, Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Multiple Grenade Launcher" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: This gun is supercool!

name: "Beloved Weapons Don't Betray" LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your stock] When "How Adorable…" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Chatting P-chan" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I-I can hear… a voice…

name: Bold Tactic, Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Then I'll empty my clip!

name: "Super Haphazard", LLENN
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and you have 1 or less other characters on your center stage, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and this card gets +2 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Looking for me?

name: Tough Partner, Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if this card is 【STAND】, and you have 1 or less other characters on your center stage, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and this card gets +2 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a climax, this card gets -3000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original position)
flavorText: All right, LLENN. I'm counting on you.

name: Feeling of Uneasiness, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have "Bold Tactic, Fukaziroh" in your waiting room, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText:
Even if I went by myself at full speed,
I wouldn't make it.

name: Best Tactic Up Their Sleeves, Fukaziroh
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, Deploy a Smoke Screen. 【REPLAY】 Deploy a Smoke Screen Your opponent puts the top card of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room. If that card is level 1 or higher, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 You cannot receive 1 or less damage by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters." (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: More smoke!

name: Lively Assault, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 Great Performance (When your opponent attacks, if this card is in the middle position of your center stage and not 【REVERSE】, your opponent frontal attacks this card instead) 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Jeez, I am!

name: Altruist, Clarence
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is on your back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Maybe it would be easier this way.

name: Bond with P-chan, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 [(4) Put 1 "Chatting P-chan" from your hand into your waiting room] When a climax is placed on your opponent's climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character facing this card, and put that card into your opponent's memory.
flavorText: Ram 'em!

name: Keeping In Check At Gunpoint, Fukaziroh
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: LLENN, I can shoot now, right?

name: Supporting Fire, Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, all of the characters on your opponent's center stage get -3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Go, LLENN!

name: Ability of a Champion, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: "Magazines & A Kiss" LLENN
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets +2000 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".
flavorText: I'll keep my promise.

name: LLENN Piling Up Experience
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters] Choose 1 card in your level and 1 card in your waiting room, and exchange them.
flavorText:
When there was a monster I couldn't defeat,
I'd learn how to beat it from a strategy site…

name: Way To Fight With a Petite Figure, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from your stage into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: How have I survived up to now? How have I won?

name: Hidden Blade, Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Return this card to your hand] When "Cut! Kick!" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, all of your characters get +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Ice Cream Before Battle, Miyu
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 "Searching for Comrades, Karen" in your hand, reveal it to your opponent, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.
flavorText: Okay. Let's get wild... Just one more spoonful.

name: Searching for Comrades, Karen
flavorText: LLENN has very few friends. Ugh, what should I do?

name: With My Beloved Weapons, Fukaziroh
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the right position of your center stage, this card's card name will also be regarded as "Fukaziroh Holding Rightony". 【CONT】 If this card is in the left position of your center stage, this card's card name will also be regarded as "Fukaziroh Holding Leftania".
flavorText: I'm counting on you, Rightony and Leftania.

name: Pinpoint Induction, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get ''【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, you may 【REST】 this card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Fuka, you wiped them out! That was brilliant! Great! Wonderful! I'm moved!

name: Helper from "ALO", Fukaziroh
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: LLENN: "Wow!"

name: Real Life Close Friends, Karen & Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Miyu: "Short hair suits you. Very nice!"

name: Chatting P-chan
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of cards in your stock ×500.
flavorText:
"Make use of your speed and agility
to fight in a style all your own."

name: Multiple Grenade Launcher
text: If you do not have a character with "Fuka(フカ)" or "Miyu(美優)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. You may choose 1 "Multiple Grenade Launcher" in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, all of your opponent's characters get -1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: This is such a powerful, fun weapon!

name: Emergency Med Kit
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your clock, and return it to your hand. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: I see. This is...

name: Don't Underestimate A Fairy!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText:
Time to receive divine retribution
from a female enemy! Take this!

name: Even By Gnawing Through The Throat
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: I'm gonna kill you! I'm gonna kill you!

name: How Adorable…
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: I want this. I'll buy it.I'll definitely buy it!

name: Cut! Kick!
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: Gotcha!

name: True Identity of the Devil, Elza
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Obstinate Death Wish, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your stock into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: Are you enjoying life and death, too? Hey, hey!

name: Devil, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if "Resurrection of the Devil" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +4000 power until end of turn, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or lower, deal 1 damage to your opponent. If it is not, deal 2 damage to your opponent. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed card to its original position)
flavorText: Yes! That... is… me!

name: Excellent Combat Skill, M
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character or an event card, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: Do you think you're a better sniper than me?

name: In Coma, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, all of your other characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText:
"She was overstimulated and passed out,
but why isn't she disconnecting? Don't tell me she's using
what they had for SAO… a NerveGear?"

name: Superb Geographical Sense, M
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Satellite Scan" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: LLENN: "So, which way?"

name: Look of a Sadist, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Pleasure in Massacre" is in your climax area, you may choose 1 of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, and put it at the bottom of his or her deck.
flavorText: He's still holding on!

name: Setting the Stage, M
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Strategy of the Cautious Type" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Now do as you please.

name: Gun Enthusiast, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 event card in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event card, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I get it. Wanting to hold onto your new gun for a while. You want to get used to "the feel" of it.

name: Origin of Name, M
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters you have. 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal the same damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText:
"Your name, "M," stands for "map"
or "mapper," right?"

name: Boring Tactic, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event card, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: No, but this is boring. It's tedious.

name: Declaration of War, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: This time, things are serious.

name: Dissatisfied Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event card, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Jeez. I wanted to kill him…

name: Leader of "MMTM", David
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.
flavorText:
All right. We'll wait for the next scan, then follow the north rampart
down the mountain.

name: Being Outnumbered? Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: This is lovely!

name: Marksmanship, M
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card cannot move to another position on the stage. 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot use "Backup" from his or her hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 【STAND】 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters on your center stage ×2000.
flavorText:
It's fine. I'll just keep firing,
taking out as many as I can.

name: Imminent "Death", M
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 2 times per turn. When your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "A Love at the Risk of One's Life" is in your climax area, and you have another character with "Pito(ピト)" or "Elza(エルザ)" in its card name, search your deck for up to 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Pito!

name: Real World Circumstances, Goushi
text: 【CONT】 If your clock has 3 or more cards, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
No. Pito was obsessed with SAO and survived.
She isn't what people call a "Survivor."

name: Purging the Traitor, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, you may choose 1 of your other characters with "M(エム)" or "Goushi(豪志)" in its card name, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Thank you.

name: Machine Guns are FUN! ZEMAL
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other "Machine Guns are FUN! ZEMAL".
flavorText: It doesn't get any better than this!

name: "KKHC" Bright Flower, Shirley
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -500 power until end of turn.

name: Fathomed Act, Elza
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Fathomed Act, Elza" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Phu-ahahahaaahaha!!

name: Fright & Betrayal, M
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 3 cards from your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, you may choose 1 level 3 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card into your memory.
flavorText: She yearns for a "death game"!

name: Excessive Excitement, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 If "Narrow Escape from Death, LLENN" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck."
flavorText: I'm gonna keep going! I… I... I... I…

name: Incensed Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you play an event card, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: You bastard! And you call yourself a warrior?

name: Satellite Scan
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, this card cannot be played from hand. Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Muramasa F10
text: Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +6000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may 【STAND】 this card."

name: Shield of M
text: 【COUNTER】 All of your opponent's characters get +3 soul and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavorText: When she stops, I'll take her out.

name: Resurrection of the Devil
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Sorry for the wait.

name: Pleasure in Massacre
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText:
Those two really developed
a deep friendship. I'm sure they'll be pouring each other
tasty booze ten minutes from now.

name: Strategy of the Cautious Type
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: There's no need to take part in trivial melee.

name: A Love at the Risk of One's Life
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Thank you…

name: Look of Admiration, Saki
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《SHINC》 or 《Sports》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Th-That's amazing!

name: VR Teatime, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
Next time I'll treat you to more sweets
than you can possibly eat.

name: VR Teatime, Fukaziroh
text: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Here, drink up. My treat.

name: Leisure with Dignity, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 until end of turn.
flavorText: Come on, let's meet up again in reality!

name: Confident in Her Dexterity! LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When your opponent's climax is placed on the climax area, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: All right! I'll run!

name: Overwhelming World View, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 Your other "Encounter With LLENN, Pitohui" on the middle position of the center stage gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 Bond/"Encounter With LLENN, Pitohui" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Encounter With LLENN, Pitohui" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: M-Maggot?

name: Karen Hoping For A Change
text: 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your draw phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "I'll Do It!! LLENN" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText:
At first, I thought things might be different
if I came to Tokyo, at least, I hoped they would…

name: "Partner" LLENN & Fukaziroh
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.
flavorText:
LLENN: "Let's go, partner!"
Fukaziroh: "All right, partner!"

name: Senior Gamer, Miyu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: The straightlaced Kohi wants to know about VR games?

name: I'll Do It!! LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Pink's Ambush" is in your climax area, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText:
P-Please let me not run into any enemies…
And may I not get hit by any bullets…

name: Sharp Look, LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText:
M: "Right, at a 45 degree angle!
Seven meters ahead!"

name: Bashful Karen
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or lower, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Stop it. You're embarrassing me.

name: Squad Leader, LLENN
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Squad Jam Invitation, Pitohui", this card gets +4000 power. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters.
flavorText: R-Roger.

name: Rampaging With Determination! LLENN
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavorText: I'm gonna go wild!

name: Tutorial
text: If you do not have a character with "LLENN(レン)" or "Karen(香蓮)" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room with "LLENN(レン)" or "Karen(香蓮)" in its card name, and return it to your hand." Put this card into your stock.
flavorText:
Starting now, I'm going to beat into you
the skills you need to live in this harsh environment!

name: Pink's Ambush
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Aiming The Instant, M
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Avatar》 or 《Net》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 level 0 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room.

name: Get Rid Of Nuisances, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Bye!

name: Veteran Player, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card at the bottom of your deck.

name: Brain Role, M
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Avatar》 or 《Net》characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: We'll take it slowly. LLENN, take the lead.

name: Encounter With LLENN, Pitohui
flavorText:
So, let's introduce ourselves.
I'm Pitohui. Or just Pito is fine.

name: First Meeting, M
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
Well, please don't be so nervous.
I mean, don't be nervous.

name: Squad Jam Invitation, Pitohui
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Squad Leader, LLENN", this card gets +4000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Avatar》 or 《Net》character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Squad Leader, LLENN" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Hey, LLENN, do you know about Squad Jam?

name: Hobby Talk, Pitohui
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Music, huh? I hardly listen to it.

name: Sadistic Smile
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Snipers' Confrontation
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText:
M: "Over here!"
Toma: "You've got guts!"
